'''MythTV''' is a [[Unix]] <ref>[http://www.mythtv.org/wiki/index.php/Operating_system Operating system - MythTV<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> application which turns a computer with the necessary hardware into a [[Computer_network|network]] [[Streaming_media|streaming]]<ref>{{cite web | title = Network - MythTV | url = http://www.mythtv.org/wiki/index.php/Network}}</ref> [[digital video recorder]], a [[digital]] [[multimedia]] [[home entertainment system]], or [[HTPC|Home Theater Personal Computer]]. MythTV is [[free software]] licensed under the [[GNU General Public License|GPL]]. It can be considered as a free and open source alternative to [[Tivo]]<ref name=post>{{Cite news
+
